snippet: With discounted Jeremy Lin T-shirts and untouched Rockets jerseys, the shelves at sports stores show how Linsanity has petered out in New York.
abstract: New Yorkers are considerably less enthusiastic about Houston Rockets guard Jeremy Lin than they were in 2011, when he played for the New York Knicks; Lin scored 22 points in Rockets victory at Madison Square Garden.
lead_paragraph: With discounted Jeremy Lin T-shirts and untouched Rockets jerseys, the shelves at sports stores show how Linsanity has petered out in New York.

headline.seo: Store Shelves Show Jeremy Lin Mania Is Over
headline.main: In New York, Lin Craze Is Out of Fashion
headline.print_headline: In New York, Craze Is Out of Fashion
